title: 352: High on CBD + Thirsty Broads
itunes:title: 352: High on CBD + Thirsty Broads
description:
This week The Broads come in and are a bit loopy/exhausted/light headed - dive in to find out why! They chat Jess’ “emergency” right before the podcast, migraines, Evan’s disbelief in water, phobias, a horrifying date kiss situation, Bekah going back to botox, Jess’ massage predicament, their challenge to ask people the MOST random questions, Bekah accidentally getting high at the worst moment, and much more! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***SQUARESPACE: Go to SQUARESPACE.COM/CHATTY for a free trial and use code CHATTY to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain!

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/CHATTY16 and use code CHATTY16 for up to 16 free meals AND 3 free gifts! 

***JENNI KAYNE: Go to JENNIKAYNE.COM and use code CHATTY at checkout to get 15% off your first order!

***BLENDERS: Go to  BLENDERSEYEWEAR.COM and use code CHATTYVIP for 15% off!

***WONDERY’S “LIFE IS SHORT”: Listen to Life is Short with Justin Long on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, or you can listen ad-free by joining Wondery Plus in the Wonder app!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
